name: Instagram Bot

on:
  schedule:
    # Runs every hour at minute 0. 
    # Note: GitHub Actions schedule can sometimes be delayed by 10-20 mins in free tier.
    - cron: '0 * * * *'
  workflow_dispatch: # Allows manual triggering for testing

jobs:
  check-and-post:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    permissions:
      contents: write # Required to commit the JSON file back to the repo

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: '3.10'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install instaloader requests

      - name: Run Bot
        env:
          IG_USERNAME: ${{ secrets.IG_USERNAME }}
          DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL: ${{ secrets.DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL }}
        run: python bot.py

      - name: Commit and Push changes
        # Only commit if latest_post.json changed
        uses: stefanzweifel/git-auto-commit-action@v5
        with:
          commit_message: "Update latest post state [skip ci]"
          file_pattern: latest_post.json
